TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XAttribute extends System.Xml.Linq.XObject

summary.span: 表示 XML 特性。

span.span: Represents an XML attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 特性是一个 XML 元素与关联的名称/值对。An XML attribute is a name/value pair associated with an XML element. 每个包含该元素的特性的列表。Each contains a list of the attributes for that element. 属性必须是唯一的元素的限定的名称。Attributes must have a qualified name that is unique to the element. 特性不派生自; 它们不是 XML 树中的节点。Attributes are not derived from ; they are not nodes in the XML tree. 相反，它们是只需与元素关联的名称/值对。Instead, they are simply name/value pairs associated with an element. 属性保留的 XML 树中它们添加到元素的顺序。Attributes are maintained in the XML tree in the order that they were added to the element. 当通过返回的属性的集合时，它们以它们已添加到了元素，和未排序的顺序返回。When a collection of attributes is returned by , they are returned in the order that they were added to the element, and are not sorted. 从技术上讲，在 XML 中，命名空间声明不是正确的属性。Technically, in XML, namespace declarations are not attributes proper. 但是，许多 XML 程序员通常不加以这一区别。However, this distinction is not normally made by many XML programmers. 相反，由于命名空间声明的 XML 语法与属性完全相同，因此大多数 XML 程序员来说将命名空间视为属性。Instead, because namespace declarations have exactly the same XML syntax as attributes, most XML programmers think of namespaces as attributes. 若要简化[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]编程接口，命名空间表示 XML 树中作为属性。To simplify the [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] programming interface, namespaces are represented in the XML tree as attributes. 此类命名空间属性会影响序列化 XML 树。Such namespace attributes impact serialization of an XML tree. 序列时，[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]尝试序列化时使用命名空间属性中指定的命名空间前缀。When serializing, [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] attempts to serialize with the namespace prefix specified in namespace attributes. 你可以使用来确定属性是否真正命名空间声明。You can use the to determine if an attribute is really a namespace declaration. 类派生自 。The class derives from . 你可以将批注添加到属性，并观察发生的事件。You can add annotations to attributes, and observe events for them. 某些方法可从 XAML 中使用。Some methods can be used from XAML. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [LINQ to XML 动态属性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0455f47c-4a68-4f2e-a3f8-dd1d85b99012)。For more information, see [LINQ to XML Dynamic Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0455f47c-4a68-4f2e-a3f8-dd1d85b99012).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建 XML 树的深层副本时，主要是内部使用此构造函数。This constructor is primarily used internally when making a deep copy of an XML tree. ## Examples 此示例演示了创建 XML 树的深层副本创建的副本，不是复本的树中的属性。This example demonstrates that creating a deep copy of an XML tree creates a copy, not a clone, of an attribute in the tree. ```csharp XElement root1 = XElement.Parse(""); // Make a deep copy. XElement root2 = new XElement(root1); if (root1.Attribute("Att1") == root2.Attribute("Att1")) Console.WriteLine("This will not be printed"); else Console.WriteLine("Creating a deep copy created a new attribute from the original."); ``` ```vb Dim root1 As XElement = ' Make a deep copy. Dim root2 As XElement = New XElement(root1) If root1.Attribute("Att1") Is root2.Attribute("Att1") Then Console.WriteLine("This will not be printed") Else Console.WriteLine("Creating a deep copy created a new attribute from the original.") End If ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Creating a deep copy created a new attribute from the original. ```

summary.span: 确定此属性是否为命名空间声明。

span.span: Determines if this attribute is a namespace declaration.

value.span: 如果此属性为命名空间声明，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this attribute is a namespace declaration; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从技术上讲，在 XML 中，命名空间声明不是正确的属性。Technically, in XML, namespace declarations are not attributes proper. 但是，大多数 XML 程序员来说通常不加以这一区别。However, this distinction is not normally made by most XML programmers. 相反，由于命名空间声明属性的语法完全相同，因此大多数 XML 程序员来说将命名空间视为属性。Instead, because namespace declarations have exactly the same syntax as attributes, most XML programmers think of namespaces as attributes. 若要简化[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]编程接口，命名空间表示 XML 树中作为属性。To simplify the [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] programming interface, namespaces are represented in the XML tree as attributes. 你可以使用此属性来确定特定[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]属性实际上是命名空间声明。You can use this property to determine if a particular [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] attribute is really a namespace declaration. ## Examples 下面的示例创建是命名空间声明属性和不是属性。The following example creates an attribute that is a namespace declaration and an attribute that is not. 它然后使用此属性来显示每个属性或不是命名空间声明。It then uses this property to display whether each attribute is a namespace declaration or not. ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XAttribute(XNamespace.Xmlns + "aw", "http://www.adventure-works.com"), new XAttribute(aw + "Att", "content") ); foreach (XAttribute att in root.Attributes()) { if (att.IsNamespaceDeclaration) Console.WriteLine("{0} is a namespace declaration", att.Name); else Console.WriteLine("{0} is not a namespace declaration", att.Name); } ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = For Each att As XAttribute In root.Attributes() If (att.IsNamespaceDeclaration) Then Console.WriteLine("{0} is a namespace declaration", att.Name) Else Console.WriteLine("{0} is not a namespace declaration", att.Name) End If Next ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` {http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/}aw is a namespace declaration {http://www.adventure-works.com}Att is not a namespace declaration ```

summary.span: 获取此属性的扩展名。

span.span: Gets the expanded name of this attribute.

value.span: 一个包含此属性 (Attribute) 名称的 。

span.span: An containing the name of this attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的展开的名称所采用的形式`{namespace}localname`。The expanded name returned by this property is in the form of `{namespace}localname`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建具有三个特性的元素。The following example creates an element with three attributes. 它然后使用此属性来打印出的每个属性的名称。It then uses this property to print out the name of each attribute. 该示例还演示创建新的属性使用的现有属性的名称。The example also shows creation of a new attribute using the name of an existing attribute. ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XAttribute(XNamespace.Xmlns + "aw", "http://www.adventure-works.com"), new XAttribute(aw + "Att", "content"), new XAttribute("Att2", "different content") ); foreach (XAttribute att in root.Attributes()) Console.WriteLine("{0}={1}", att.Name, att.Value); Console.WriteLine(""); XElement newRoot = new XElement(aw + "Root", from att in root.Attributes("Att2") select new XAttribute(att.Name, "new content")); foreach (XAttribute att in newRoot.Attributes()) Console.WriteLine("{0}={1}", att.Name, att.Value); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = _ For Each att As XAttribute In root.Attributes() Console.WriteLine("{0}={1}", att.Name, att.Value) Next Console.WriteLine("") Dim NewRoot As XElement = _ >_ For Each att As XAttribute In NewRoot.Attributes() Console.WriteLine("{0}={1}", att.Name, att.Value) Next ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` {http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/}aw=http://www.adventure-works.com {http://www.adventure-works.com}Att=content Att2=different content Att2=new content ```

summary.span: 获取父元素的下一个属性。

span.span: Gets the next attribute of the parent element.

value.span: 一个包含父元素下一个属性 (Attribute) 的 。

span.span: An containing the next attribute of the parent element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性保留的 XML 树中它们添加到元素的顺序。Attributes are maintained in the XML tree in the order that they were added to the element. 当通过返回的属性的集合时，它们已添加，并且未排序顺序返回它们。When a collection of attributes is returned by , they are returned in the order that they were added, and are not sorted. 当请求通过此属性的下一个属性时，此属性将返回此属性后，添加的属性。When you request the next attribute through this property, this property returns the attribute that was added after this attribute. 如果此属性不具有父级，或如果没有下一步的属性，则此属性返回`null`。If this attribute does not have a parent, or if there is no next attribute, then this property returns `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何循环访问使用此属性的元素的属性。The following example shows how to iterate through the attributes of an element using this property. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att1", 1), new XAttribute("Att2", 2), new XAttribute("Att3", 3), new XAttribute("Att4", 4) ); XAttribute att = root.FirstAttribute; do { Console.WriteLine(att); } while((att = att.NextAttribute) != null); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = Dim att As XAttribute = root.FirstAttribute Dim val As Boolean = True Do Console.WriteLine(att) att = att.NextAttribute Loop While (Not (att Is Nothing)) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Att1="1" Att2="2" Att3="3" Att4="4" ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为派生自的所有类包含属性，你可以编写代码进行操作的具体子类的集合。Because all classes that derive from contain a property, you can write code that operates on collections of concrete subclass of . 集合中每个节点的节点类型随后可以测试你的代码。Your code can then test for the node type of each node in the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个特性，，然后显示使用此属性的节点类型。The following example creates an attribute, and then displays the node type using this property. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att", "content") ); XAttribute att = root.FirstAttribute; Console.WriteLine(att.NodeType); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = Dim att As XAttribute = root.FirstAttribute Console.WriteLine(att.NodeType.ToString) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Attribute ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将转换为时从某个属性或元素，允许的值为"0"、"1"和任何字符串，它会生成"true"或"false"转换为小写。When converting to from an attribute or element, allowed values are "0", "1", and any string that produces "true" or "false" after trimming and conversion to lower case. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个带属性值，然后将强制转换到。The following example creates an attribute with a value, then casts it to . ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("BoolValue", true) ); bool bv = (bool)root.Attribute("BoolValue"); Console.WriteLine("(bool)BoolValue={0}", bv); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = Dim bv As Boolean = CBool(root.Attribute("BoolValue")) Console.WriteLine("(bool)BoolValue={0}", bv) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` (bool)BoolValue=True ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此转换运算符使用类来执行此转换。This conversion operator uses the class to do the conversion. ## Examples 下面的示例创建具有日期和时间的内容的属性。The following example creates an attribute with date and time content. 它然后将其强制转换到要检索其值。It then casts it to to retrieve the value. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att", new DateTimeOffset(new DateTime(2006, 10, 6, 12, 30, 0))) ); Console.WriteLine(root); // casting from a strictly formatted XML attribute DateTimeOffset dt = (DateTimeOffset)root.Attribute("Att"); Console.WriteLine("dt={0}", dt); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = _ /> Console.WriteLine(root) ' casting from a strictly formatted XML attribute Dim dt As DateTimeOffset = CType(root.Attribute("Att"), DateTimeOffset) Console.WriteLine("dt={0}", dt) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` dt=10/6/2006 12:30:00 PM -07:00 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将转换为时从某个属性或元素，允许的值为"0"、"1"和任何字符串，它会生成"true"或"false"转换为小写。When converting to from an attribute or element, allowed values are "0", "1", and any string that produces "true" or "false" after trimming and conversion to lower case. ## Examples 下面的示例创建具有布尔内容的属性。The following example creates an attribute with Boolean content. 然后检索的值通过强制转换为的。It then retrieves the value by casting to of . ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("BoolValue1", true), new XAttribute("BoolValue2", false) ); bool? bool1 = (bool?)root.Attribute("BoolValue1"); bool? bool2 = (bool?)root.Attribute("BoolValue2"); Console.WriteLine("Nullable boolean: BoolValue1={0}", bool1); Console.WriteLine("Nullable boolean: BoolValue2={0}", bool2); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = Dim bool1 As Nullable(Of Boolean) = CType(root.Attribute("BoolValue1"), Nullable(Of Boolean)) Dim bool2 As Nullable(Of Boolean) = CType(root.Attribute("BoolValue2"), Nullable(Of Boolean)) Console.WriteLine("Nullable boolean: BoolValue1={0}", bool1) Console.WriteLine("Nullable boolean: BoolValue2={0}", bool2) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Nullable boolean: BoolValue1=True Nullable boolean: BoolValue2=False ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某个属性或包含日期和时间的内容的元素值空间与的日期和时间 ISO 8601 中所述紧密相关。The value space of an attribute or element that contains date and time content is closely related to the dates and times described in ISO 8601. 在创建某个属性或元素包含日期和时间的内容时，请按照 W3C 规范格式化的属性或元素值。When creating an attribute or element that contains date and time content, the attribute or element values are formatted per the W3C specification. 请参阅 W3C 规范的更多详细信息。See the W3C specification for more details. 当强制转换为行为并不严格的从某个属性或元素。Behavior is lax when casting to a of from an attribute or element. 即使未完全按照 W3C 规范格式化的属性或元素值，值适当地转换为的。Even if the attribute or element value is not formatted exactly per the W3C specification, the value is appropriately converted to a of . 此转换运算符使用将从转换。This conversion operator uses to convert from a . ## Examples 下面的示例创建具有日期和时间作为内容的属性。The following example creates an attribute with a date and time as content. 然后检索的值通过强制转换为的。It then retrieves the value by casting to of . ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att", new DateTime(2006, 10, 6, 12, 30, 0)) ); DateTime? value = (DateTime?)root.Attribute("Att"); Console.WriteLine("Nullable DateTime: value={0}", value == null ? "null" : value.ToString()); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = /> Dim value As Nullable(Of DateTime) = CType(root.Attribute("Att"), Nullable(Of DateTime)) Console.WriteLine("Nullable DateTime: value={0}", IIf(value.HasValue, value.ToString(), "null")) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Nullable DateTime: value=10/6/2006 12:30:00 PM ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某个属性或包含时间跨度内容的元素值空间与 ISO 8601 中所述的持续时间内容紧密相关。The value space of an attribute or element that contains time span content is closely related to duration content as described in ISO 8601. 在创建某个属性或包含时间跨度内容的元素时，请按照 W3C 规范格式化的属性或元素值。When creating an attribute or element that contains time span content, the attribute or element values are formatted per the W3C specification. 请参阅更多详细信息的 W3C 规范。Please see the W3C specification for more details. 当强制转换为行为并不严格从某个属性或元素。Behavior is lax when casting to a from an attribute or element. 即使未完全按照 W3C 规范格式化的属性或元素值，值适当地转换为。Even if the attribute or element value is not formatted exactly per the W3C specification, the value is appropriately converted to a . ## Examples 下面的示例将创建具有时间跨度内容属性The following example creates an attribute with time span content. 然后检索的值通过强制转换为。It then retrieves the value by casting to . ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att", new TimeSpan(1, 5, 30)) ); TimeSpan value = (TimeSpan)root.Attribute("Att"); Console.WriteLine("value={0}", value); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = /> Dim value As TimeSpan = CType(root.Attribute("Att"), TimeSpan) Console.WriteLine("value={0}", value) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` value=01:05:30 ```

summary.span: 获取父元素的上一个属性。

span.span: Gets the previous attribute of the parent element.

value.span: 一个包含父元素的上一个属性 (Attribute) 的 。

span.span: An containing the previous attribute of the parent element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性保留的 XML 树中它们添加到元素的顺序。Attributes are maintained in the XML tree in the order that they were added to the element. 当通过返回的属性的集合时，它们已添加，并且未排序顺序返回它们。When a collection of attributes is returned by , they are returned in the order that they were added, and are not sorted. 当请求通过此属性的上一个特性时，此属性将返回之前此属性已添加的属性。When you request the previous attribute through this property, this property returns the attribute that was added before this attribute. 如果此属性没有父级，或者如果此属性是第一个属性，则此属性返回`null`。If this attribute does not have a parent, or if this attribute is the first attribute, then this property returns `null`. 类将其属性存储为单向链接列表的对象。The class stores its attributes as a singly-linked list of objects. 这意味着，属性必须遍历属于元素的属性的列表。This means that the property must traverse the list of attributes that belong to the element. 因此，使用此属性，这种情况可能会影响你的性能。Therefore, using this property might affect your performance. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何循环访问使用此属性的元素的属性。The following example shows how to iterate through the attributes of an element using this property. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att1", 1), new XAttribute("Att2", 2), new XAttribute("Att3", 3), new XAttribute("Att4", 4) ); XAttribute att = root.LastAttribute; do { Console.WriteLine(att); } while((att = att.PreviousAttribute) != null); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = Dim att As XAttribute = root.LastAttribute Dim val As Boolean = True Do Console.WriteLine(att) att = att.PreviousAttribute Loop While (Not (att Is Nothing)) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` Att4="4" Att3="3" Att2="2" Att1="1" ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于修改 XML 树。You can use this method to modify an XML tree. 此方法将导致事件发生。This method will cause events to occur. 有很多情况下在其中你可能想要删除的一组属性。There are many scenarios in which you might want to remove a set of attributes. 在[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]编程，你不应操作或修改的一组节点时进行查询的该组中的节点。In [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] programming, you should not manipulate or modify a set of nodes while you are querying for nodes in that set. 实际上，这意味着你不应循环访问一组属性并将其删除。In practical terms, this means that you should not iterate over a set of attributes and remove them. 相反，你应将其具体化为使用扩展方法。Instead, you should materialize them into a using the extension method. 然后循环访问列表中，并删除的属性。Then you can iterate over the list, removing the attributes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[混合声明性代码/强制性代码 Bug (LINQ to XML)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d9a5c404-2b0e-46cd-a358-0e78773b3094)。For more information, see [Mixed Declarative Code/Imperative Code Bugs (LINQ to XML)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d9a5c404-2b0e-46cd-a358-0e78773b3094). 或者，如果你想要删除的一组特性，建议你使用方法。Alternatively, if you want to remove a set of attributes, it is recommended that you use the method. 此方法将这些属性复制到列表中，然后循环访问列表中，删除的属性。This method copies the attributes to a list, then iterates over the list, removing the attributes. ## Examples 下面的示例创建具有三个特性的元素。The following example creates an element with three attributes. 它然后删除其中一个特性。It then removes one of the attributes. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute("Att1", "content1"), new XAttribute("Att2", "content2"), new XAttribute("Att3", "content3") ); XAttribute att = root.Attribute("Att2"); att.Remove(); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = Dim att As XAttribute = root.Attribute("Att2") att.Remove() Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` ```
